name: translator-electron-monorepo
description: Translator by Stage5 - AI-powered video translation tool
author: Jong UK Lee

scripts.clean:deep: bunx rimraf node_modules bun.lockb && bun install
scripts.build: bunx rimraf packages/*/dist && bunx concurrently "bun run build:main" "bun run --cwd packages/preload build" "bun run --cwd packages/renderer build" && cd packages/renderer && bunx esbuild render-host-script.tsx --bundle --platform=browser --format=esm --target=es2022 --external:electron --outfile=../../render-host-script.js && cd ../..
scripts.build:dev: bunx rimraf packages/*/dist && bunx concurrently "bun run --cwd packages/main build:dev" "bun run --cwd packages/preload build" "bun run --cwd packages/renderer build" && cd packages/renderer && bunx esbuild render-host-script.tsx --bundle --platform=browser --format=esm --target=es2022 --external:electron --outfile=../../render-host-script.js && cd ../..
scripts.dev: bun run dev:init && bunx concurrently -k -n electron,main,preload,renderer,hostRenderer "bunx electron ." "bun run --cwd packages/main build:watch" "bun run --cwd packages/preload dev" "bun run --cwd packages/renderer dev" "cd packages/renderer && bunx esbuild render-host-script.tsx --bundle --platform=browser --format=esm --target=es2022 --external:electron --outfile=../../render-host-script.js --watch"
scripts.package: bun run package:intel && bun run package:arm
scripts.package:intel: bun run clean && bun run build && electron-rebuild --arch=x64 --force && cross-env TARGET_ARCH=x64 node scripts/rebuild-vad.js && electron-builder --mac --x64
scripts.package:arm: bun run clean && bun run build && electron-rebuild --arch=arm64 --force && cross-env TARGET_ARCH=arm64 node scripts/rebuild-vad.js && electron-builder --mac --arm64
